definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
(particle in old Chinese similar to 啊)
(particle in old Chinese similar to 啊)

sentences.chinese: 嘿，別那麼可憐兮兮的了。

sentences.english: I have no excuse for this pitiful page…
sentences.chinese: 請原諒我畫了如此可憐兮兮的頁子。

sentences.english: Sending a sorry looking bunch of carnations might do you more harm than good.
sentences.chinese: 送一束看起來可憐兮兮的康乃馨可是喫力不討好哇。

sentences.english: Well, self-hypnosis very sad, then crying poor face.
sentences.chinese: 哼，很會悲傷自我催眠，之後可憐兮兮的淚流滿面。
